channel.title: Dynamic IP
channel.description: How would someone know if they had a Dynamic IP, and how would they change it if they wanted?

item.title: Dynamic IP
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:3, topic:434120”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=536836.msg3925243#msg3925243 date=1330145915]
If your external IP keeps changing, then you’ve got a dynamic IP. If you have one, I think unplugging your modem and / or router for like 10-15 minutes would change it, not 100% sure on that.
[/quote]
I’m sorry, I’m not familiar with this kind of stuff, what is the external IP?[/quote]

http://www.whatismyipaddress.com If you want to see if yours is dynamic, keep visiting that site often and see if it changes.

Read full topic

If your external IP keeps changing, then you’ve got a dynamic IP. If you have one, I think unplugging your modem and / or router for like 10-15 minutes would change it, not 100% sure on that.
